article: My mother had just died from cancer, and I was shocked. But _ I had never cared much for her. On the way to the funeral suddenly my car broke down . I checked and found my tire was flat. Unfortunately I didn't have a _ one. Worse still, it began to rain. I quickly jumped back into my car, and just sat there _ to myself. Then it seemed out of _ this older woman pulled up behind me. I told her about my problem and then _ she offered to drive me there. I was telling the lady the _ as we went and she told me she was heading the exact _ way. I felt bad making her go out of her way but she would not care about it. On our arrival, I asked her for her name and number and thanked her for her trouble, feeling a tear roll down my cheek, not for my mother, but for the _ of the stranger I had just met. After the funeral, I went back home and arranged for my car to be _ . Everything became back to _ for me and soon I forgot about this lady. Yesterday I was looking through some old shoeboxes and came across her _ . I called her. Her daughter answered and told me her mother had recently _ . I was so shocked that I didn't talk for a minute or two. Finally I asked _ the funeral was and decided to go to it. The funeral was sad but it really made me realize something. You never know when you _ die, so you must do your best to help others in order to make your life _ . I am very _ to this woman whom I never really had known, because she _ my life. I now realize that in order for us to be truly happy, we all must love one another and work towards a _ world and society.
